001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.buffer;
002
003/**
004 * Central registry for shared {@link BufferPool} instances used by IO components.
005 */
006public final class BufferPools {
007  private static final int IO_BUFFER_BYTES = 64 * 1024;
008  private static final int MAX_POOL_ENTRIES = Math.max(4, Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors());
009
010  private static final BufferPool IO_POOL = new BufferPool(IO_BUFFER_BYTES, MAX_POOL_ENTRIES);
011
012  private BufferPools() {}
013
014  /**
015   * Provides the shared IO buffer pool sized for file/network writes.
016   */
017  public static BufferPool ioBuffers() {
018    return IO_POOL;
019  }
020}
